EmailTemplate.name: 202002_Americas_General_Military-Base-of-the-Future_Webinar.Thank you for attend
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending our webcast, Military Base of the Future. Hello {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Thank you for attending our webcast – Military Base of the Future.
This webcast is now on-demand <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/mfYfyyfsFfUiyMYaJfZRLu]]>, should you like to view it again. Please use code 654168.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more! Sign up here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>.
We look forward to seeing you again.
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace WATCH NOW <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/mfYfyyfsFfUiyMYaJfZRLu]]>
